description:
Fans of Daryl and Beth on "The Walking Dead" are in luck, because it seems that their Season 4 storyline will continue in episode 13, "Alone." The pair, who were at the focus of Sunday's (March 2) "Still," continue on their journey as life on the road gets more difficult. 喜欢《行尸走肉》Daryl和Beth组合的小伙伴们很幸运，因为他们的小暧昧在第四季13集《Alone》中还会继续。上周播出的《Still》那一集中，Daryl和Beth时候绝对的主角，而他们的生活似乎越来越难了。

Based on the above promo, some zombies come upon the pair and the situation becomes so serious Beth tells Daryl she won't leave him. Meanwhile, another shot shows them holding hands in a graveyard. Is there actually a romance afoot? 从下一集的预告皮哦按来看，应该是有一大批丧尸袭来，在这种危险的情况下Beth才会跟Daryl说她不会离开他。同时还有一小段中，我们看到他们牵手了。他们真的会迸发出爱情火花？

Also returning in "Alone" are Maggie, Sasha and Bob. Like Daryl slowly losing his arrows in "Still," these three are running low on bullets -- they only have six left! -- which could mean they're close to being overrun by walkers. Hopefully Glenn, Tara, Abraham, Eugene and Rosita find them soon. 还会出现在下一集中的还有Maggie、Sasha和Bob。Daryl的弓箭越来越少了，而Maggie他们也没子弹了，Maggie他们最终只剩6枚子弹！而他们正在被一大群丧尸围攻！幸好Glenn、Tara、Abraham、Eugene和Rosita很快就要和他们汇合了。

The synopsis for "Alone" reads: "One group finds a shelter; a group has a realization about protection." "The Walking Dead" airs Sundays on AMC at 9 p.m. ET/PT.《Alone》这一集的剧情简介：有一组幸存者找到了避难所；一组避难者找到了真正的保护。《行尸走肉》第四季13集将会在周日晚回归在AMC电视台播出。
